title: Ep. 2 Jayde Adams
itunes:title: Ep. 2 Jayde Adams
itunes:subtitle: Cariad talks to comedian Jayde Adams
description:
Cariad talks to comedian Jayde Adams (Edinburgh Best Newcomer Nominee, Winner of Funny Women) about the death of her sister. As ever they discuss grief, still being angry with people who are dead, and the pain of missing.You can tweet the show @thegriefcast or email us thegriefcast@gmail.com because you are not alone.

Support this show http://supporter.acast.com/griefcast.

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
